message.raw:
Very experimental RenderEngine class. It doesn't look good and we haven't agreed on that. I may revert that change.
Other changes include moving the XML loading from OgreVisual (as that class is broader than just <visual>), moving
GetUniqueName from Entity to OgreVisual, moving loading of the Gui to the Gui factory (I guess moving it to the Gui
class would be better), all the CreateOgre methods have the same behaviour.
My system is too unstable now to make extensive test on these changes, I upload it to try to work with other laptop.
I hope it does not brake anything.

message:
Very experimental RenderEngine class. It doesn't look good and we haven't agreed on that. I may revert that change.
Other changes include moving the XML loading from OgreVisual (as that class is broader than just <visual>), moving
GetUniqueName from Entity to OgreVisual, moving loading of the Gui to the Gui factory (I guess moving it to the Gui
class would be better), all the CreateOgre methods have the same behaviour.
My system is too unstable now to make extensive test on these changes, I upload it to try to work with other laptop.
I hope it does not brake anything.
